author: andreas
content:
Yup! Currently it's in the NEWS section, but it will stay accessible. Well, this whole left bar is a mess. Of course "NEWS" should be somewhere at the top, but I like the two widgets with the images greatly. I have tried all sorts of widgets (BlogRush, some bookmarking widgets), and they are all rubbish. These from BlogsJam work. At normal times, when I don't have a tutorial freshly up, I get about five percent of my hits from people browsing the widget. That's great. It makes my site easily accessible for people who would otherwise only have read a tutorial.

Regarding page 25: Interesting, but I should have known. While I took it, it reminded me of the lower left of your lighthouse images here ðŸ™‚
